items.title: Puerto Rico may enter new year in  darkness after sudden blackout
items.description: The US island territory has experienced severe power issues since Hurricane Maria struck in 2017

items.title: Watch: Hong Kong, Taiwan and China's turn celebrate the new year
items.description: Celebrations are being held as countries welcome in the new year.

items.title: Foreign fighters given senior Syrian army posts, reports say
items.description: The move will raise concerns over the role radicalised foreign militants may play in Syria's future.

items.title: Why has the Pitt and Jolie divorce taken eight years?
items.description: The pair were married for two years - but it has taken four times that time to reach a divorce deal.

items.title: What is a state funeral and who will attend Jimmy Carter's?
items.description: There will be multiple days of ceremonies and services in Washington DC and Georgia to honour the former president.
